title: Turk Interview
itunes:title: Turk Interview
description:
Turk' stopped by The Breakfast Club to open up about using hard drugs like coke and heroin since 14, as well as the falling out of the Hot Boyz and Wayne, the Cash Money lawsuit, doing a song with Master P and getting over their beef from back in the day and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
